feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine standard environment PHP
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine standard environment PHP

entry.content: Support for deploying your existing apps in the standard environment to Cloud Run using the gcloud beta app migrate-to-run command is in Preview. For more information, see Deploy an App Engine app in the standard environment to Cloud Run.
entry.summary: You can now migrate your App Engine standard environment apps to Cloud Run using the `gcloud beta app migrate-to-run` command. This feature is currently in Preview and allows for a smoother transition of your existing applications. For detailed instructions, refer to the official documentation on migrating App Engine standard apps to Cloud Run.
entry.title: Feature: Migrate App Engine Standard to Cloud Run

entry.summary: The PHP 8.5 runtime is now available in preview. This update brings new features and improvements to the PHP environment on App Engine Standard.
entry.title: Feature: PHP 8.5 runtime now in preview

entry.content: PHP 5 is deprecated. You won't be able to deploy PHP 5 applications, even if your organization previously used an organization policy to re-enable deployments of legacy runtimes. Your existing PHP 5 applications will continue to run and receive traffic. We recommend that you migrate to the latest supported version of PHP.
entry.summary: PHP 5 is no longer supported. New deployments are disabled, but existing applications will continue to run. We recommend migrating to a supported PHP version.
entry.title: Deprecated: PHP 5 Deprecation

entry.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. Update your application settings in the App Engine standard environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).
entry.title: Feature: TLS 1.1 and earlier deprecated in March 2025.

entry.content: Support for the PHP 8.4 runtime is in General Availability (GA).
entry.summary: PHP 8.4 runtime is now generally available. This update provides new features and improvements for your applications.
entry.title: Feature: PHP 8.4 runtime now available
